item.title: [PI] Help
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

I’m trying to get the command ::Item to work for all players but it just doesn’t seem to be working.

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::pickup 995 200”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

What should I do?

Read full topic
